creator: simon.litwan@wyona.com
text:
while moving a doc, the ant task deletes the docs job-entry in the jobs.xml. if
the doc has some children with job-entries, the childrens entries won't get
deleted in jobs.xml.

More than 3 years with no activity. 

Reopen this bug if your are still facing this.
creator: florent.andre-dev@4sengines.com
